title: Extended interview: Aubrey O'Day on Sean "Diddy" Combs, Netflix documentary and forgiveness
summary: In an exclusive interview, "Danity Kane" singer Aubrey O'Day opens up about appearing in Netflix's documentary series, "Sean Combs: The Reckoning," where she reveals she learned about an affidavit from an unidentified witness who claims to have seen Combs and another man sexually assault her. O'Day talks about processing the information and her life since tâ€¦
